FuncDef: The display dhcp receive server-packet command displays whether the device is enabled to process ACK packets that are destined for gateways and proactively sent by a DHCP server when users are online and to parse QoS profile names.
CLIs: display dhcp receive server-packet [ domain <domain-name> ] configuration

ParaDef.Info:
Domain name.
The value is a string of 1 to 253 characters.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display dhcp receive server-packet domain wsx configuration
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display dhcp receive server-packet command displays whether the device is enabled to process ACK packets that are destined for gateways and proactively sent by a DHCP server when users are online and to parse QoS profile names.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
